alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 4:28AM EST until January 16 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills will continue until late this morning, with wind chill readings as low as 10 to 15 degrees below zero. * WHERE...The Wind Chill Advisory covers all of southeast Missouri, all of southern Illinois, parts of western Kentucky near and west of the Land Between the Lakes area, and Posey County in southwest Indiana. * WHEN...The advisory is until 10 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chill values will only improve to 0 to 8 degrees above zero this afternoon.
info.instruction: Use caution if you go outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
